summary: A plugin that improves the visual effects in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
A plugin that improves the visual effects in Skyrim. It uses the original game resources.

ATTENTION! This plugin is only for those who want a more cinematic graphics but can't use an ENB or Skyrim Special Edition as I am.

To create some of the screenshots I used Skyrim Reloaded, but only a DoF effect, nothing more.

The plugin should be loaded after all esm files.

It is not compatible with any plugins that change the weather.

What exactly does this plugin do (for now):

[list]
[*]Changed the HDR settings.
[*]Changed the color of the sun and ambient light.
[*]Changed the duration of the day and night.
[*]Changed the night darkness (now the nights are really dark, as it should be where there are no megacities).
[*]Changed the fog distance for all types of weather.
[/list]
In this first version I have change only the weather conditions in Skyrim and DLC Dawnguard, but in next versions I will change the weather conditions in other places, water and interior light.

[b][center][color=#e69138]~ R E Q U I R E M E N T S ﻿~[/color][/center][/b]
[center]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. Legendary Edition (1.9.32.0.8)[/center]
[center][b][color=#e69138]~ I N S T A L L A T I O N ~[/color][/b][/center]
[center]I advise you to install the plugin via Nexus Mod Manager, but if you want, you can install it manually.
For that: copy the content of the archive to the Skyrim/Data folder, run the launcher, click on the "Data files", double click on the plugin name, then "OK" and "Exit".[/center]
author: Nakrin
